title: ISic004474. I.Sicily inscription 004474
body:
Facsimile Images

Βι{κ}κτωρία
ἔζησε ἔτη βί-
ον ἄμεμπτον
ἐτελεύτησεν
5δὲ ἐτῶν πεν-
τήκοντα´ ἐν-
θάδε κεῖται

Apparatus criticus

Text after Orsi 1896, checked against photograph, with some layout annotations.

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • Orsi 1896 no. 330 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001710
